item.description:
Topic: Growing a Startup Organization
1. Introductions (15 mins)
2. Presentation: by Erik K., Executive Director of "Not Me!" a new nonprofit that teaches self-defense to at-risk populations. The presentation will include a demonstration. (30 Minutes) Q & A will follow for 15 mins.
3. Topic Drawing (we put topics in a hat and cover as many as possible in a meeting) (30 mins)
4. Announcements, opportunities, connections. (10 mins)
5.. Exchange business cards/social networking. (15 mins)
NOT-ME! IS A NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATION DEDICATED TO PROVIDING INSTRUCTION, CONDITIONING, AND TRAINING TO INDIVIDUALS IN AT-RISK POPULATIONS.
Our primary objective is to help at-risk individuals survive violent attacks and deter aggressive confrontations. The majority of students are people in groups that are traditionally considered vulnerable or have been historically targeted for violence. These groups include but are not limited to people with physical disabilities, women, the gay and lesbian population, and racial minorities.
We will conduct a condensed 30 minute summery of the Not-Me! self-defense course.
Together in Motion
1 Broadway
Arlington MA 02474
781-643-1377
www.not-me.org
Please visit their website for directions.
item.name: Nonprofit Connector Group: Growing a Start Up Organization
